DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
I'd only end up killing this plant anyway.

DLG ITM_1
"""
I probably won't read these books again. 
someone else will get more enjoyment out of them.
"""

DLG ITM_2
I need to go to bed earlier anyway.

DLG ITM_3
this t-shirt faded a long time ago.

DLG ITM_4
I love this jumper but it doesn't fit me anymore.

DLG ITM_5
"""
I haven't played the guitar in years. 
time to give up on my teenage dream of becoming a rock star.
"""

DLG ITM_7
"""
this sedentary lifestyle is killing me. 
maybe I should set up a standing desk.
"""

DLG ITM_8
"""
I really should drink less.

I'm gonna pour these down the sink.
"""

DLG ITM_9
"""
I don't need makeup to be beautiful.
cultural beauty norms are bullshit anyway.
"""

DLG ITM_a
I don't need this amp. I can just play acoustic.

DLG ITM_b
"""
photography is depressing. 

I don't want to live in my memories. 
I want to be present in every moment.
"""

DLG ITM_c
"""
no sense in holding on to childhood toys. 
I don't need their companionship. 
I'm strong on my own.
"""

DLG ITM_d
"""
I'm sick of making sure my hair is perfect before I go out.
if people want to judge me based on my appearance, 
that's their problem.
"""

DLG ITM_e
"""
I never play any of these games anymore.
my cousin would probably appreciate them.
"""

DLG ITM_f
"""
I should be reading instead of watching TV. 
there's never anything good on anyway.
"""

DLG ITM_g
"""
I keep meaning to patch the holes in these shoes. 
I'm probably never gonna get around to it.
they can go.
"""

DLG ITM_h
"""
all these years of practice and I'm still no good at DJing. 
my friend Monica always wanted to give it a go. 
I should give her my decks.
"""

DLG ITM_i
"""
I just can't seem to finish this painting. 
any time I add to it I just make it worse. 
enough is enough.
"""

DLG ITM_j
my friend Julia could probably use these art supplies.

DLG ITM_k
"""
I hardly ever listen to these records anymore. 
I should just sell them.
"""

DLG ITM_l
"""
I'm always having to empty this bin.
if I didn't buy so much stuff I wouldn't have to throw so much away.
"""

DLG ITM_6
"""
I spend too much time online. I should get out more. 
social media depresses me anyway.
"""

VAR a
42
